hooks.command: notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Claude needs your attention' -t 5000 -u normal && pw-play $(shuf -n1 -e ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonWhat{1,2,3,4}.wav) >/dev/null 2>&1 &
notify-send 'Home Manager' 'Configuration applied successfully!' -t 5000 -u normal && pw-play $(shuf -n1 -e ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonYes{1,2,3,4}.wav) >/dev/null 2>&1 &

notify-send 'Home Manager' 'Build completed successfully' -t 3000 -u low && pw-play $(shuf -n1 -e ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonReady1.wav ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonYes3.wav) >/dev/null 2>&1 &

notify-send 'Home Manager' 'Build/switch failed! Check errors.' -t 5000 -u critical && pw-play $(shuf -n1 -e ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonAngry4.wav ~/.config/home-manager/sounds/peon/PeonDeath.wav) >/dev/null 2>&1 &
